scripts.build: tsc && npm run report:deps_graph && npm run build:doc
scripts.deploy:doc: git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages
scripts.report:deps_graph: npx depcruise --exclude '^node_modules' --output-type dot --prefix 'https://github.com/dragonman225/notionapi-agent/tree/master/' src/index.ts | dot -T svg > report/deps_graph.svg
scripts.upgrade: pnpm i typescript@latest eslint@latest dependency-cruiser@latest @typescript-eslint/parser@latest @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin@latest @types/node@latest ts-node@latest @dnpr/make-request@latest --save-exact
